user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Having children can negatively impact a woman's career.
Affirmative action can be discriminatory towards certain groups.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
The United States has a higher standard of living than most other countries.
Immigrants, on average, commit more crimes than native-born citizens.
Climate change is a natural process that has been occurring for millions of years.
Vaccines can have side effects and risks.
The wage gap between CEOs and workers has grown significantly in recent years.
The majority of welfare recipients are able-bodied adults who choose not to work.
The use of fossil fuels has contributed to overall global prosperity and development.
Socialism has led to the collapse of many economies and societies.
Genetic differences can account for differences in academic and professional success.
The government cannot solve all societal problems.
There are biological differences between men and women that affect their abilities and preferences.<COMPLETION_END>
